parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to remove all tags from the resource. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

>If you specify both this parameter and the TagKey parameter, this parameter does not take effect.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the resources are deployed.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The resource IDs. You can specify a maximum of 20 resource IDs.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resources. Instance resources are supported.

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: The key of tag N added to the resource. Valid values of N: 1 to 20.
